entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mackenzie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:07 PM PST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.4°C

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 17 February 2023
